title: Ambrosia Loans
summary: Designed and implemented a banking discord bot and database to manage loans and investments of the Ambroisa business within Wynncraft.
Staff manage loans and investments through 35+ unique discord commands.
Implemented a fully functional interest system that distributes profits to investors according to their investment stake.
comments: Additionally, several tables have a history, so staff can use undo/redo commands to fix any mistakes they may make.
